snippet: Almost two months after a victory at the Withers Stakes, Alpha will finally make his reappearance in Saturday’s $1 million Wood Memorial at Aqueduct.
lead_paragraph: Almost two months after a victory at the Withers Stakes, Alpha will finally make his reappearance in Saturday’s $1 million Wood Memorial at Aqueduct.

headline.seo: Alpha’s Preparation for Kentucky Derby? Lots of Rest
headline.main: Colt’s Preparation for Kentucky Derby Includes Plenty of Rest
headline.print_headline: Colt’s Preparation for Kentucky Derby Includes Plenty of Rest
